footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: Welcome to the Art of Healing
heroSubtitle1: A space for deep healing, care, and transformation with ancestral medicines.
heroSubtitle2: Discover a safe and loving space to reconnect with your essence and heal from within.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Reserve your spot in one of our upcoming ancestral medicine healing ceremonies.
pastCeremoniesSubtitle: Relive the magic and transformation of our past encounters.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound and transformative experience. Discover our recommendations to align your body, mind, and spirit.
contactCommunityText: Each ceremony is an opportunity to connect with a community of conscious and loving individuals. Join us and be part of this transformative family.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral psychoactive brew from the Amazon, made from the combination of the 'chacruna' (Psychotria viridis) leaf and the 'ayahuasca' (Banisteriopsis caapi) vine. It has been used for centuries in traditional indigenous rituals for healing, spiritual connection, and self-knowledge.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew induces a modified state of consciousness, allowing access to deep levels of the mind and spirit. It facilitates the release of emotional blockages, a deeper understanding of oneself, and a reconnection with the essence of life and the universe. The experience is guided to ensure a safe and respectful process.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches, heals, and guides. Each experience is unique and personal, adapting to the needs of each individual. It is not a recreational substance but a sacred tool for inner work and personal growth.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: It helps to release limiting beliefs and unresolved emotional patterns, providing a clearer and more authentic perspective on life.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It can address deep traumas, anxieties, and depressions, promoting emotional and spiritual reconciliation.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It facilitates a profound connection with your inner self, with nature, and with the universe, generating a sense of unity and purpose.
groupCeremonyDescription: We share the experience in a circle, creating a space of collective support and trust. The group energy enhances healing and connection.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, focused on your individual process. Ideal for those seeking deep and focused work on specific aspects.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the spiritual guides who will accompany you on your healing journey with love, respect, and deep wisdom.
preparationProcessDescription: The journey begins before the ceremony. We prepare the body with a special diet and the mind with clear intentions.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred night where medicine guides you through a process of introspection and healing in a safe space.
experienceProcessDescription: Each journey is unique. You may experience visions, deep emotions, and revelations that will lead you to self-knowledge.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we accompany you to integrate the teachings into your daily life, turning the experience into lasting growth.
dietTitle: Diet: The Temple of Your Body
dietSubtitle: We purify our body to receive the medicine in the best way. The diet begins at least 3 days before and continues for 3 days after.
allowedFoodsList: White meats (chicken or fish), preferably organic.
prohibitedFoodsList: Spicy, fried, or heavily processed foods.
mentalPrepSubtitle: The intention is the compass of your journey. We dedicate time to clarify our purpose.
meditationDescription: Find moments of silence to connect with yourself and calm your mind.
intentionsDescription: What are you looking to heal or understand? Write down your intentions to keep them present.
reflectionDescription: Writing can be a powerful tool to explore your thoughts and emotions.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can be an intense emotional journey. It is essential to come with an open heart, willing to feel and release without judgment. Trust the process and the support of the guides. Every emotion that arises is an opportunity for healing and liberation.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare your sacred space with comfortable and meaningful items.
comfortItemsList: Change of clothes for the next day.
essentialsList: Amulet or personal object of power.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your space.
loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back to El Arte de Sanar.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully logged in with Google.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: We have sent a verification link to your email.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to save your progress, receive updates on our ceremonies, and be part of our healing community.
editGuideDescription: Update the information for this spiritual guide.

videoFormUrlOrUpload: Please provide a video URL or upload a file.
deleteVideoConfirmDescription: This will permanently remove the video from the memories.

mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete the ceremony. This action cannot be undone.

selectNewVideo: Select a new video to upload
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or enter a URL.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeTabDescription: Change the main colors of the application (dark theme). Provide HSL values.
chatbotWelcome: Greetings, soul on a journey. I am the spiritual guide from The Art of Healing. How can I illuminate your path today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting with the spirits of technology right now. Please try again later.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review conversations between users and the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full message history.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been started yet.
userManagementSubtitle: View all registered users and manage their roles.
allUsersDescription: List of all users who have registered on the platform.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send a promotional or informational email to all registered users.
emailSubjectPlaceholder: A special announcement from El Arte de Sanar
